languages.text: "Я была бы рада биться плечом к плечу с моими сестрами, но и нынешняя судьба не тяготит меня. Где бы я ни была и кто бы меня не сопровождал меня — еретиков ждет смерть. Вот что важно!"
"I will fight alongside my sisters again, but my present fate is not a burden to me. No matter where I go or who I am with, I bring death to heretics. That is what matters!"
languages.original_text: "Я была бы рада биться плечом к плечу с моими сестрами, но и нынешняя судьба не тяготит меня. Где бы я ни была и кто бы меня не сопровождал меня — еретиков ждет смерть. Вот что важно!"

traits.locale_text: "I would gladly fight shoulder to shoulder with my sisters, but my present fate is not a burden to me. No matter where I go or who I am with, I bring death to heretics. That is what matters!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I would gladly fight shoulder to shoulder with my sisters, but my present fate is not a burden to me. No matter where I go or who I am with, I bring death to heretics. That is what matters!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I would gladly fight shoulder to shoulder with my sisters, but my present fate is not a burden to me. No matter where I go or who I am with, I bring death to heretics. That is what matters!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I would gladly fight shoulder to shoulder with my sisters, but my present fate is not a burden to me. No matter where I go or who I am with, I bring death to heretics. That is what matters!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “我自然愿意再次与我的姐妹并肩作战，但当前的任务对我而言并非不可承受的重担。无论我身处何处、与谁为伴，最重要的都是消灭异端分子！”
languages.original_text: "I will fight alongside my sisters again, but my present fate is not a burden to me. No matter where I go or who I am with, I bring death to heretics. That is what matters!"

traits.locale_text: “我自然乐意与我的姐妹并肩作战，但当前的任务对我而言也并非不可承受的重担。无论我身处何处、与谁为伴，最重要的是消灭异端！”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Un jour, je me battrai de nouveau aux côtés de mes sœurs, mais pour l'heure, le destin en a décidé autrement. Et je suis parfaitement satisfaite de mon sort, car où que j'aille et qui que j'accompagne, je sème la mort parmi les hérétiques, et c'est tout ce qui compte ! »
languages.original_text: "I will fight alongside my sisters again, but my present fate is not a burden to me. No matter where I go or who I am with, I bring death to heretics. That is what matters!"

traits.locale_text: « Rien ne me ferait plus plaisir que de combattre aux côtés de mes sœurs, mais mon destin en a décidé autrement. Et je suis parfaitement satisfaite de mon sort, car où que j'aille et qui que j'accompagne, je sème la mort parmi les hérétiques, et c'est tout ce qui compte ! »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich werde wieder an der Seite meiner Schwestern kämpfen, aber mein derzeitiges Schicksal ist keine Bürde für mich. Egal, wohin ich gehe oder wer bei mir ist, ich bringe den Ketzern den Tod. Nur das zählt!"
languages.original_text: "I will fight alongside my sisters again, but my present fate is not a burden to me. No matter where I go or who I am with, I bring death to heretics. That is what matters!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich würde liebend gern Schulter an Schulter mit meinen Schwestern kämpfen, doch mein momentanes Schicksal stellt keine Last für mich dar. Ganz gleich, wohin ich gehe oder wer bei mir ist, ich bringe den Ketzern den Tod. Nur das zählt!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「私は再びシスターたちと肩を並べて戦うつもりだけど、今の運命は私にとって重荷ではない。 どこへ行っても、誰といても、私は異端者に死をもたらす。それこそが重要なんだから！」
languages.original_text: "I will fight alongside my sisters again, but my present fate is not a burden to me. No matter where I go or who I am with, I bring death to heretics. That is what matters!"

traits.locale_text: 「私は喜んでシスターたちと肩を並べて戦うつもりだけど、今の運命は私にとって重荷ではない。 どこへ行っても、誰といても、私は異端者に死をもたらす。それこそが重要なんだから！」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Volveré a luchar junto a mis hermanas algún día, pero mi situación actual no me supone ninguna carga. Vaya donde vaya y esté con quien esté, traigo la muerte a los herejes. ¡Eso es lo que importa!».
languages.original_text: "I will fight alongside my sisters again, but my present fate is not a burden to me. No matter where I go or who I am with, I bring death to heretics. That is what matters!"

traits.locale_text: «Lucharía con mucho gusto junto a mis hermanas, pero mi situación actual no me supone ninguna carga. Vaya donde vaya y esté con quien esté, traigo la muerte a los herejes. ¡Eso es lo que importa!».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "I will fight alongside my sisters again, but my present fate is not a burden to me. No matter where I go or who I am with, I bring death to heretics. That is what matters!"

languages.text: "Kardeşlerimle beraber çarpışacağımız günler elbet geri gelecek lakin şu anki yazgım yük olmuyor bana. Nereye gidersem gideyim, kime eşlik edersem edeyim kâfirlere ölüm yağdırıyorum. Önemli olan da bu!"
languages.original_text: "I will fight alongside my sisters again, but my present fate is not a burden to me. No matter where I go or who I am with, I bring death to heretics. That is what matters!"

traits.locale_text: "Kardeşlerimle beraber çarpışacağımız günler elbet geri gelecek lakin şu anki yazgım yük olmuyor bana. Nereye gidersem gideyim, kime eşlik edersem edeyim kâfirlere ölüm yağdırıyorum. Önemli olan da bu!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
